Workdone:

Great source this time around...with line audio. First we rotated, crop out borders, fix perspective and resize to 720p and did our first encode. Took that file and did all types of filters like Camcorder denoiser to get rit of the mix color threw the video, Msu Denoiser, HQ Smoother to help get rit of video Noise. RGB, Contrast and Levels. We did notice video colors seem to appear and reappear threw some scene... but I think that how the video is cause of certain lighting.

AUDIO:
Line audio had some static so we clean the noise out.. and did some audio enhancements with BASS and Treble and sync it with our video.

P.S.
Watch Video on a 39" HDTV and was perfectly in sync... V8.5 A9
Completely watchable... SORRY NO SAMPLE cause we used megui to rip our 720p to a smaller size and used x264 for better quality.

ENJOY!
